column3: A peppy rat from a poor village in Oakshire Forest, she aims to storm the dungeon, rebuild her village, and save her family!
column4: A peppy rat from a poor village in Oakshire Forest, she aims to storm the dungeon, rebuild her village, and save her family!

column3: Banished by the elder frogs, her backpack is blessed by the Dreaming Tree. Magical carvings spawn each turn she is in danger.
column4: Banished by the elder frogs, her backpack is blessed by the Dreaming Tree. Magical carvings spawn each turn she is in danger.

column3: When you can't find a hero, you gotta make one! CR-8 is a mishmash of metal and nerd stuff that will take care of any enemy automatically - provided his circuitry is properly organized.

column3: You must conquer the dungeon by delving deep to the center to discover the ancient cheeses hidden there. You are armed only with your magic backpack.
column4: You must conquer the dungeon by delving deep to the center to discover the ancient cheeses hidden there. You are armed only with your magic backpack.

column3: You head into the dungeon, knowing very few make it back alive!
column4: You head into the dungeon, knowing very few make it back alive!

column3: You have made it to the center of the dungeon and have found the golden cheese! More content is coming! Please join our discord and show off your  backpack!
column4: You have made it to the center of the dungeon and have found the golden cheese! More content is coming! Please join our discord and show off your  backpack!

column3: You continue forward! Things are about to get pretty hard...
column4: You continue forward! Things are about to get pretty hard...

column3: You decide to start again to get new cheese!
column4: You decide to start again to get new cheese!

column3: You encounter a locked door. Will you open it?
column4: You encounter a locked door. Will you open it?

column3: You see him from a distance, kneeling yet noble. It seems he saw you long before. His mouse eyes are strong and piercing. You feel that he sees into your soul... 'May I help you further?' he asks. 'A few coins and I will give you an item for archers.'
column4: You see him from a distance, kneeling yet noble. It seems he saw you long before. His mouse eyes are strong and piercing. You feel that he sees into your soul... 'May I help you further?' he asks. 'A few coins and I will give you an item for archers.'

column3: He takes the coins and rubs them in his mouse paw. "Just a few will do nicely. I hope this can help you further," he says.
column4: He takes the coins and rubs them in his mouse paw. "Just a few will do nicely. I hope this can help you further," he says.

column3: I understand, he says and leans against the nearby wall. "Don't worry. Archers are coming soon. The dungeon will improve with time."
column4: I understand, he says and leans against the nearby wall. "Don't worry. Archers are coming soon. The dungeon will improve with time."

column3: The path of an arrow - to the heart
column4: The path of an arrow - to the heart

column3: You see him from a distance, kneeling yet noble. It seems he saw you long before. His mouse eyes are strong and piercing. You feel that he sees into your soul... "A trade my sibling?" he asks. "Discard the tools of badgers. Be one with flight."
column4: You see him from a distance, kneeling yet noble. It seems he saw you long before. His mouse eyes are strong and piercing. You feel that he sees into your soul... "A trade my sibling?" he asks. "Discard the tools of badgers. Be one with flight."

column3: Give a weapon, get archery kit.
column4: Give a weapon, get archery kit.

column3: He takes the weapon and tosses it into the darkness. "This is not a weapon. It is a crutch." He hands you new items.
column4: He takes the weapon and tosses it into the darkness. "This is not a weapon. It is a crutch." He hands you new items.

column3: Welcome to the school of archery.
column4: Welcome to the school of archery.

column3: I understand, he says and leans against the nearby wall. "Don't worry. Archers are coming soon. The dungeon will improve with time."
column4: I understand, he says and leans against the nearby wall. "Don't worry. Archers are coming soon. The dungeon will improve with time."

column3: Age has crept in around his snout. You can see the white fur and shaggy edges from around his coat. "I'm getting out of the game," he says. "If you have something to eat, I might as well give you my cleaver."
column4: Age has crept in around his snout. You can see the white fur and shaggy edges from around his coat. "I'm getting out of the game," he says. "If you have something to eat, I might as well give you my cleaver."

column3: Looks good to me, he says. You can't believe that he eats the whole thing without a moment's thought. "Here you go," he says and hands you his chef knife. "I won't be needing this any more."
column4: Looks good to me, he says. You can't believe that he eats the whole thing without a moment's thought. "Here you go," he says and hands you his chef knife. "I won't be needing this any more."

column3: I loved that knife. Use it well!
column4: I loved that knife. Use it well!

column3: Sure you won't change your mind?
column4: Sure you won't change your mind?

column3: Ah! Hope you aren't too hungry.
column4: Ah! Hope you aren't too hungry.

column3: Very good sir, he says. "But please do change your mind."
column4: Very good sir, he says. "But please do change your mind."

column3: The wall splits open. Inside you can see a vast abyss. Green eyes peer in. You recognize them as the eyes of a predator. Strange sounds echo from the place and an offer is made...
column4: The wall splits open. Inside you can see a vast abyss. Green eyes peer in. You recognize them as the eyes of a predator. Strange sounds echo from the place and an offer is made...

column3: Take a rare item for a curse
column4: Take a rare item for a curse

column3: You can feel an acknowledgement and an item appears. The eyes watch as a horrible curse is placed in your backpack
column4: You can feel an acknowledgement and an item appears. The eyes watch as a horrible curse is placed in your backpack

column3: Two items appear in front of you, but a horrible curse has been placed upon you. The eyes give no sign of emotion.
column4: Two items appear in front of you, but a horrible curse has been placed upon you. The eyes give no sign of emotion.

column3: The eyes watch you. They show no sign of emotion.
column4: The eyes watch you. They show no sign of emotion.

column3: Well, howdy! she says as you approach! Her nose wiggles and she shakes her gigantic tail. "I've been doing some fishing. Care to buy one?"
column4: Well, howdy! she says as you approach! Her nose wiggles and she shakes her gigantic tail. "I've been doing some fishing. Care to buy one?"

column3: She tosses you a fish. "Care for another?"
column4: She tosses you a fish. "Care for another?"

column3: You say no. The smell is starting to get to be a bit much.
column4: You say no. The smell is starting to get to be a bit much.

column3: I'm still here if you want more!
column4: I'm still here if you want more!

column3: If you want a fish, let me know!
column4: If you want a fish, let me know!

column3: Nothing like a good fish, ya hear?
column4: Nothing like a good fish, ya hear?

column3: Oh! Well how ya' doin' friend?
column4: Oh! Well how ya' doin' friend?

column3: A badger stands by her anvil. Her arms strong and resilient from years spent in the dungeon. She nods at you. "I forge," she says. Badgers aren't much for words. "Upgrade?" she asks.
column4: A badger stands by her anvil. Her arms strong and resilient from years spent in the dungeon. She nods at you. "I forge," she says. Badgers aren't much for words. "Upgrade?" she asks.

column3: She takes your shield and strikes it. A ring echoes out through the dungeon. "Weak," she says. "Make better." With a few precise blows she reshapes the shield. You didn't know it could look this good.
column4: She takes your shield and strikes it. A ring echoes out through the dungeon. "Weak," she says. "Make better." With a few precise blows she reshapes the shield. You didn't know it could look this good.

column4: She takes your shield and strikes it. A ring echoes out through the dungeon. "Weak," she says. "Make better." With a few precise blows she reshapes the shield. You didn't know it could look this good.

column4: She nods and carries on her work.

column3: A badger stands by her anvil. Her arms strong and resilient from years spent in the dungeon. She nods at you. "I forge," she says. Badgers aren't much for words. "Upgrade?" she asks.
column4: A badger stands by her anvil. Her arms strong and resilient from years spent in the dungeon. She nods at you. "I forge," she says. Badgers aren't much for words. "Upgrade?" she asks.

column3: She takes your weapon, turns it a few times, and then presses it to her anvil. Her hammer sends sparks flying and you turn around to cover your eyes. When you turn back, your weapon glows with a new purpose.
column4: She takes your weapon, turns it a few times, and then presses it to her anvil. Her hammer sends sparks flying and you turn around to cover your eyes. When you turn back, your weapon glows with a new purpose.

column4: She takes your weapon, turns it a few times, and then presses it to her anvil. Her hammer sends sparks flying and you turn around to cover your eyes. When you turn back, your weapon glows with a new purpose.

column3: She takes your weapon, turns it a few times, and then presses it to her anvil. Her hammer sends sparks flying and you turn around to cover your eyes. When you turn back, your weapon glows with a new purpose.
column4: She takes your weapon, turns it a few times, and then presses it to her anvil. Her hammer sends sparks flying and you turn around to cover your eyes. When you turn back, your weapon glows with a new purpose.

column3: She nods and carries on her work.
column4: She nods and carries on her work.

column3: The porcupine's have travelling clinics throughout the dungeon. They seek to heal the animals who venture deep into the dangers here.
column4: The porcupine's have travelling clinics throughout the dungeon. They seek to heal the animals who venture deep into the dangers here.

column3: She runs her paw across your wounds. The quills on her back shake and you are lost in the sound of them. When you come to, many wounds are healed.
column4: She runs her paw across your wounds. The quills on her back shake and you are lost in the sound of them. When you come to, many wounds are healed.

column3: She reaches out to you. You feel a great strength in you rising. Your paws are firmly planted, but it almost feels that you are floating.
column4: She reaches out to you. You feel a great strength in you rising. Your paws are firmly planted, but it almost feels that you are floating.

column3: You are stronger now than before.
column4: You are stronger now than before.

column3: May you achieve what seemed impossible.
column4: May you achieve what seemed impossible.

column3: I sense a great disturbance, she says. "Something horrible has been placed in your backpack. Let me see." She removes a single quill and pokes it into your bag carefully in several spots. "That should do it," she says.
column4: I sense a great disturbance, she says. "Something horrible has been placed in your backpack. Let me see." She removes a single quill and pokes it into your bag carefully in several spots. "That should do it," she says.

column3: The curses can't hurt you now.
column4: The curses can't hurt you now.

column3: Your backpack is a true friend.
column4: Your backpack is a true friend.

column3: We are here to protect the brave!
column4: We are here to protect the brave!

column3: Come hero, let me heal you!
column4: Come hero, let me heal you!

column3: My sisters are here for you!
column4: My sisters are here for you!

column3: Nestled deep in a throng of mushrooms you see a magical font, its cool waters flowing. Above the water, a humid mist circles and spills over the edge. In the distance  you hear frogs croaking... no... chanting.
column4: Nestled deep in a throng of mushrooms you see a magical font, its cool waters flowing. Above the water, a humid mist circles and spills over the edge. In the distance  you hear frogs croaking... no... chanting.

column3: You wish to make it home safely, your backpack overflowing with rare cheeses. You feel a warmth in you. You can do this!
column4: You wish to make it home safely, your backpack overflowing with rare cheeses. You feel a warmth in you. You can do this!

column3: The water feels warm and relaxing on your skin. The croaking grows louder. From behind a mushroom a frog nods at you. Your wounds are healed.
column4: The water feels warm and relaxing on your skin. The croaking grows louder. From behind a mushroom a frog nods at you. Your wounds are healed.

column3: You watch the water as it flows across the floor of the dungeon. It pools up around the feet of an enemy. You look up. The frogs are not happy. "Zealot!" they cry and attack!
column4: You watch the water as it flows across the floor of the dungeon. It pools up around the feet of an enemy. You look up. The frogs are not happy. "Zealot!" they cry and attack!

column3: Drop the li'l Buckler! You can take the item you land on!
column4: Drop the li'l Buckler! You can take the item you land on!

column3: My house looks like a hat!
column4: My house looks like a hat!

column3: Well hello there. Her voice is cool and friendly - not what you expected. "May I interest you in some potions? In return... I ask for just a taste." "A taste? Of me?" you ask. "Just a nibble darling," she says. "You'll barely feel a thing."
column4: Well hello there. Her voice is cool and friendly - not what you expected. "May I interest you in some potions? In return... I ask for just a taste." "A taste? Of me?" you ask. "Just a nibble darling," she says. "You'll barely feel a thing."

column3: Her teeth press into your neck. "Oh delicious. May I tempt you again?"
column4: Her teeth press into your neck. "Oh delicious. May I tempt you again?"

column3: Very well darling, she says. "Though I am sorry to see you go."
column4: Very well darling, she says. "Though I am sorry to see you go."

column3: The proper ingredients for the potion...
column4: The proper ingredients for the potion...

column3: We brew what we can  to do what we must
column4: We brew what we can  to do what we must

column3: A drop of red, a drop of green...
column4: A drop of red, a drop of green...

column3: My dear there are reasons why things are as they are.
column4: My dear there are reasons why things are as they are.

column3: Your snout wiggles as you inhale a musky odor. Someone here is in need of a bath. You turn around and standing there is a rat. You never heard him come out. "Let's make a trade." he says. "I'll give you a rarer item of the same type..."  He chuckles. There are no guarantees.
column4: Your snout wiggles as you inhale a musky odor. Someone here is in need of a bath. You turn around and standing there is a rat. You never heard him come out. "Let's make a trade." he says. "I'll give you a rarer item of the same type..."  He chuckles. There are no guarantees.

column3: Get a rarer item of the same type
column4: Get a rarer item of the same type

column3: He takes the item and examines it. "How's this for a trade?" There's no time to say no.
column4: He takes the item and examines it. "How's this for a trade?" There's no time to say no.

column3: You see his tail flick ominously beneath his cloak. A smile crosses his lips. "Come now," he says. "I think you'll see it's in your interest."
column4: You see his tail flick ominously beneath his cloak. A smile crosses his lips. "Come now," he says. "I think you'll see it's in your interest."

column3: His cloak billows as he steps out from the shadows. "We can make a trade, you and I." he says. You know risks are involved.
column4: His cloak billows as he steps out from the shadows. "We can make a trade, you and I." he says. You know risks are involved.

column3: Get a different item of the same rarity
column4: Get a different item of the same rarity

column3: He takes your item and from his cloak pulls a replacement.
column4: He takes your item and from his cloak pulls a replacement.

column3: Very well, he says. "But can I perhaps change your mind?"
column4: Very well, he says. "But can I perhaps change your mind?"

column3: The squirrel looks at you absent mindedly. "Long ago I retired from the patrol", he says. "Now I spend my days adventuring and reliving my glory days. I don't need much of my old equipment anymore. Can I interest you in something?"
column4: The squirrel looks at you absent mindedly. "Long ago I retired from the patrol", he says. "Now I spend my days adventuring and reliving my glory days. I don't need much of my old equipment anymore. Can I interest you in something?"

column3: From beneath his bushy tail, he pulls a shield. "This may protect you. Remember, loot is only valuable if you make it back alive."
column4: From beneath his bushy tail, he pulls a shield. "This may protect you. Remember, loot is only valuable if you make it back alive."

column3: I hope the shield serves you well!
column4: I hope the shield serves you well!

column3: He reaches into his tunic and pulls out a weapon, tossing it to you.
column4: He reaches into his tunic and pulls out a weapon, tossing it to you.

column3: Strike down any who oppose the patrol!
column4: Strike down any who oppose the patrol!

column3: The patrol lives by these weapons!
column4: The patrol lives by these weapons!

column3: He scratches at the ground. Beneath his feet is a mound of nuts and hidden among them, many a delicious food.
column4: He scratches at the ground. Beneath his feet is a mound of nuts and hidden among them, many a delicious food.

column3: An army marches on its stomach!
column4: An army marches on its stomach!

column3: Better than what we used to eat on the patrol.
column4: Better than what we used to eat on the patrol.

column3: Hark! You are greeted by a member of the patrol!
column4: Hark! You are greeted by a member of the patrol!

column3: Inscribed on the statue: "Anna bestowed gifts The world felt safe in her arms healer in a fire"
column4: Inscribed on the statue: "Anna bestowed gifts The world felt safe in her arms healer in a fire"

column3: You leave a coin. Then kneel before the statue and say a prayer. Anna somehow seems to reflect light even in this dark place.
column4: You leave a coin. Then kneel before the statue and say a prayer. Anna somehow seems to reflect light even in this dark place.

column3: Steal coins [Get 10 gold or a fight begins]
column4: Steal coins [Get 10 gold or a fight begins]

column3: Travelers leave coins by the statue as a token for their prayers. You decide that Anna won't miss just a few.
column4: Travelers leave coins by the statue as a token for their prayers. You decide that Anna won't miss just a few.

column3: You approach the statue to grab a few coins. As the coins jingle, you turn to see an approaching group of enemies.
column4: You approach the statue to grab a few coins. As the coins jingle, you turn to see an approaching group of enemies.

column3: You say a quick prayer. You decide to leave the statue behind.
column4: You say a quick prayer. You decide to leave the statue behind.

column3: A Red fox in the dark
column4: A Red fox in the dark

column3: The fox steps out from the shadows. "Natural prey.", he says. "If we battle, I shall make short work of you. Be ye friend or foe?"
column4: The fox steps out from the shadows. "Natural prey.", he says. "If we battle, I shall make short work of you. Be ye friend or foe?"

column3: He nods and steps aside to let you pass. Your tail twitches instinctively. You're lucky he let you live.
column4: He nods and steps aside to let you pass. Your tail twitches instinctively. You're lucky he let you live.

column3: He draws his sword. Slowly sizing you up...
column4: He draws his sword. Slowly sizing you up...

column3: He draws his sword... and then... stops. "Ha!" he laughs. "A rat with the heart of a fox. I respect you. You may have my blade."
column4: He draws his sword... and then... stops. "Ha!" he laughs. "A rat with the heart of a fox. I respect you. You may have my blade."

column3: Oh look, a weak little rat.
column4: Oh look, a weak little rat.

column3: If I was hungry, you'd be dead already.
column4: If I was hungry, you'd be dead already.

column3: I've never spared a life before.

column3: A waft of smoke passes by your nose. What is that? You smell a lot of strange things in the swamp, but ritual smoke of the turtles has an unmistakable order. Smells sweet like chocolate. Smells like they need to wash their shell too. "Our magic is a gamble." she says to you. "Will you let fate guide you?"

column3: A wise rabbit sits there, meditating in the midst of this dangerous place. "Fear not", he says. ""My name is matthew, and I have lived here for many years. With proper organization, any challenge may be overcome. Now let me assist you..."
